settings.name: Kacey Musgraves
settings.title: Recording Artist
settings.review: Karee Hays is a skincare genius. I have no words for how grateful I am to be this comfortable in my skin. Thanks to Karee and her team, my skin glows.

settings.name: Nathan Followill
settings.title: Recording Artist, Kings of Leon
settings.review: My skin, pores, and nostril hairs have never been in better hands.

settings.name: Kristin Cavallari
settings.title: TV Personality
settings.review: I never miss my facial appointments with Karee Hays. It’s worth the trip to Nashville to keep my skin glowing and camera ready. Her products are absolutely amazing. I especially love how she compounds the perfect blend of ingredients that actually change my skin.

settings.name: Shane McAnally
settings.title: Singer/Songwriter/Producer
settings.review: Karee Hays makes lookin' in the mirror a lot more fun...

settings.name: Hayley Williams
settings.title: Recording Artist, Paramore
settings.review: Karee Hays is good for the skin and the soul. I will not see anyone else in Nashville for skincare. She has helped turned my skin around and given me my confidence back. Her products are amazing… Her vibe is awesome. Guess my secret is out now!

settings.name: Faith Hill
settings.title: Recording Artist
settings.review: I honestly can’t imagine what my skin would look like without Karee. She has forever changed my skin and taught me how to properly follow a routine that works. A huge, noticeable difference. To put it plain and simple… I am forever grateful and completely dedicated.

settings.name: Maren Morris
settings.title: Recording Artist
settings.review: Karee and her incredible team have transformed my skin. I always look forward to my facials and just adore her products. I can finally say my skin glows.

settings.name: Landyn Hutchinson
settings.title: Lifestyle Blogger, Living with Landyn
settings.review: They say beauty is more than skin deep. Yet Karee will have you thinking differently about that statement. What an amazing difference in my skin since the day I walked through these doors.

settings.name: Joe Don Rooney
settings.title: Recording Artist, Rascal Flatts
settings.review: Being on the road can really take a toll on you physically. Unfortunately, a lot of that wear and tear shows on your face. Karee Hays has been keeping my skin healthy and rock n’ roll-ready for over seven years. Facials aren’t just for the ladies anymore, fellas!

settings.name: Cassadee Pope
settings.title: Recording Artist
settings.review: Before Karee Hays, I felt self-conscious about my skin. On stage, the last thing I wanted was to be wondering if people could see my blemishes. Now that my skin is clear and radiant, I can focus on the music and just have fun!

settings.name: Laura Simms
settings.title: Model
settings.review: I've had stubborn acne since I was 12. Once I started seeing Karee and her team, not only did she teach me how to care for and protect my fair and sensitive skin with a simple routine, she also helped lead me to find that my acne was caused by an allergy. Thanks to Karee and her awesome products, makeup artists compliment my great skin all the time!

settings.name: Brandt Snedeker
settings.title: Professional Golfer
settings.review: I apologize to Karee for having to undo all the damage I do to my skin on the golf course. Thanks for keeping me looking youngish.

settings.name: Kim Carnes
settings.title: American Singer-Songwriter
settings.review: Since discovering Karee and her team, I love my skin big time... Her treatments and products keep me 'glowing' at home and on the road... Yay!!!
